name: Eject Button
description_En: Quickly move in a designated direction.
description_Cn: 立即向指定方向进行移动。

name: Fluffy Tail
description_En: Apply a debuff to a wild Pokemon for 3 seconds. The debuff disables the affected Pokemon’s attacks and triggers an additional hit when the user deals direct damage to the target. The additional hit deals 100% Atk + 60% SpA + 10*(Level-1) + 100 and has a 0.5 second cooldown.
description_Cn: 对野生宝可梦施加一个有害效果，持续 3 秒。此效果使得野生宝可梦无法动弹，每当对其造成直接伤害时触发一次附加伤害(100% x 攻击 + 60% 特攻 + 10 x (等级 - 1) + 100)，这个效果有 0.5 秒间隔时间。

name: Full Heal
description_En: Remove all status conditions and become immune to hindrances for a short time. (1.5s duration)
description_Cn: 解除自身的妨碍状态，并进入妨碍无效状态，持续 1.5 秒。

name: Goal Getter
description_En: Doubles goal scoring speed for a short time. (10s duration)
description_Cn: 使用后，在 10 秒内得分速度翻倍。

name: Potion
description_En: Restores some of your HP. (20% max HP + 160)
description_Cn: 立即回复自身少量体力。(20% 最大体力 + 160)

name: Slow Smoke
description_En: Create a ring of smoke around you, greatly slowing enemies movement speed by 80% and attack speed by 30% within the area. (2s duration)
description_Cn: 围绕自身圆形内放出烟雾，会大幅降低区域内的宝可梦移动速度和攻击速度，移动速度降低 80%，攻击速度降低 30%，持续 2秒。

name: X Attack
description_En: Raises your basic Attack Speed by 25%, Attack and Sp. Attack by 20% for a short time. (7s duration)
description_Cn: 在 7 秒内提高自己的攻击 25%、特攻 20% 以及普通攻击的速度 20%。

name: X Speed
description_En: Raises your movement speed by 45% and become immune to move speed reduction for 6s.
description_Cn: 在 6 秒内提高自身移动速度 45% 并且免疫降低移动速度
